name: Beyond the ice
description:
Beyond The Ice is a narrative game inspired by Reigns, made in 48h for a game jam along the theme "Perilous Exploration".

You play as a noble convict, leading an expedition in a fictional land, trying to find out what lies beyond the ice wall surrounding your world and to explore it.

No other control is required except left-click.
